meanings.definition: A person who has been admitted to a place or organization.
meanings.sent1: The school welcomed the new admittees with a special orientation session.
meanings.sent2: The admittees were excited to start their first day at the company.
meanings.sent3: The admittees joked that they were now official members of the 'admittee club'.
meanings.sent4: Becoming an admittee felt like stepping into a whole new world of opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The admittees proudly wore their admission badges.

meanings.sent1: All the admittees gathered for a group photo to celebrate their acceptance.
meanings.sent2: The admittees' names were listed on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent3: The admittees formed a team to participate in the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: Being admittees meant they were now part of a larger community.
meanings.sent5: The admittees shared stories of their admission journeys.
